channel.title: Types on Outcome documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Types on Outcome documentation

item.title: `in_place_type_t<T>`
item.description: Either std::in_place_type_t<T> if C++ 17 or later, else a local emulation. Note that the templated variable in_place_type is also aliased or emulated locally. Requires: Nothing. Namespace: OUTCOME_V2_NAMESPACE Header: <outcome/config.hpp> Inclusions: <utility> if C++ 17 or later only, for std::in_place_type_t<T>.
